Quickstart Guide¶

This section provides a quickstart guide on how to work with the test.

Working with the test¶

  1. Installation: Make sure you have the necessary packages installed. You can install the required packages using the requirements.txt. .. code-block:: console

    (.venv) $ pip install -U -r requirements.txt

  2. Running the tests: You can run the tests using pytest: .. code-block:: console

    (.venv) $ pytest

  3. Generating the Documentation: If you need to regenerate this documentation, navigate to the docs directory and run: .. code-block:: console

    (.venv) $ make html

  4. Viewing the Documentation: After running the make html command, open _build/html/index.html in your web browser to view the generated documentation.
